title: My Little One - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: College/University   Doctors   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Older Love Interests   Short Story   Younger Love Interests
author: Flightless Bo-Chan   不会飞的菠酱
description:
On his 18th birthday, a little boy’s friends held a party for him at a bar. There, he gets the number of a certain Doctor Yan, who, unfortunately, refuses to respond to the little one’s texts and calls. 

But fate brings them together when Doctor Yan’s mother asks him to look after her best friend’s son.>
